text.content:
CC
symptomatic hypoglycemia

Subjective

Diabetes mellitus type 2
As noted in telephone note from yesterday, the pt has had 2 episodes of 
symptomatic hypoglycemia in the last 4-6 weeks.  One episode happened on 
6/15/2010 at about 5 AM (BG=62) and another episode occurred this morning at 
about 4 AM (BG=53); she felt shaky and a little confused yesterday while her BG 
was low (she was able to correct the low BG by drinking juice).  The pt reports 
she has been compliant with use of Glyburide, taking only 2.5 mg daily as 
instructed.   She has been checking her BG nearly every day for the last 2 weeks 
(average BG about 110, usually averages about 135).


Hypertension
The patient denies light-headedness and states her BP has been well controlled 
per her BP readings (high of 124/76 since last visit).


Postoperative hypothyroidism
No constipation, diarrhea, fatigue, insomnia or palpitations.


Depression
The pt denies depression, fatigue, feelings of guilt and lack of interest.  PHQ-
9 score = 1 today.


Allergies
Metformin (severe nausea)
Fluoxetine (severe anxiety)
Citalopram (severe anxiety)


PMH
Diabetes mellitus type 2
Hypertension
Osteopenia
Postoperative hypothyroidism
Depression
Hyperlipidemia

PSurgHx
Thyroidectomy (complete, bilateral): 2002


FamHx
Diabetes mellitus type 2 and osteoporosis in the patients mother.


SocHx
Divorced mother of 5 (her two youngest children live with her; they are 14 and 
16-years-old).
The patient quit smoking about 6 years ago.  She drink alcohol rarely.  She 
denies use of illicit drugs.
The patient works as an administrative assistant at a law firm in town.


Medications
Glyburide 2.5 mg PO daily #90, 3 refills
Lisinopril 40 mg PO daily #90, 3 refills
Chlorthalidone 25 mg PO daily #90, 3 refills
Calcium carbonate 500 mg PO q8h #270, 3 refills
Ergocalciferol 1000 units PO daily #90, 3 refills
Levothyroxine sodium preparation 125 mcg PO daily #90, 3 refills
Venlafaxine 75 mg PO BID #180, 3 refills
Simvastatin 80 mg PO daily #90, 3 refills
Aspirin 81 mg PO daily #90, 3 refills

Review of Systems
All negative except as noted above. 


Objective
VITALS:
        SBP:128, DBP:69, Pulse:70, POx:97, Temp:98.6, RR:14, Weight:260, 
Height:64, BMI:45
EXAM:
GEN: NAD
NECK: normal thyroid
HEART: RRR no M/R/G
FEET: normal monofilament test bilaterally; no abnormal lesions noted; normal DP 
pulses bilaterally
EXT: no LE edema
PSYCH: normal mood and behavior
text.author: PROVIDER,ONE
